title: 4800 Jungler
body:
Hello!

Whats a nice jungler thats 4800 at the moment? I cant decide over which to get so im asking for opinions. Im currently thinking about Sejuani  {{champion:113}} for her tank and cc. Maokai {{champion:57}} also looks nice for his amazing tank. Nocturne {{champion:56}} is also in the picture due to his dmg and ganking with ult and I also looking at skarner {{champion:72}} since they are gonna kinda buff him a bit and i luv that ult. So can i get some opinions please?

Thanks!

> Buff? HA. bs. They nerfing all his sht to the ground, might as well have no base stats, and an ult that does 2 instances of 20? what sort of retard ult does 40 damage. his only thing that does something now is new passive, and to fun with that because enemies make it completely useless

Skarner's ult does 20 base damage twice because it also applies 100% of his AD damage twice (making it 200%) and 50% AP twice too. Basically meaning, that if he had say 300 AD and his ult is still at level 1 for just this scenario and he has no AP. He is going to do 640 damage with his ult. 800 if levelled to 3. He also now gets 100 movement speed (along with the attack speed and mana regen from his passive) when he ults a target, meaning he can drag them even further now. He also gets his passive stats when stunning a target with his E passive. So... yeah. I guess it's good people think Skarner is weak.
And what is Skarner going to do with those lovely 500 range pillars, that are easily captured and controlled by enemies over him? He has no passive

1150 range. And I don't know, perhaps easily capture them back? He has more of a passive than he had before. His old passive is now on his E and doesn't need 3 stacks to apply the stun (major buff). They have already compensated for being out of Crystal Spires range, by letting him have his passive stats while ulting a champion or stunning with his E passive. I don't see people saying 'Rek'Sai's tunnels are useless because enemies can easily destroy them." or "Heimerdinger's turrets are useless because enemies can easily destroy them". "Skarner is useless for having counterplay"... okay.

I don't think tank junglers will be effective because the tank meta is dying. The reason it is dying is because i believe cinderhulk will get nerfed and the 25% bonus hp is changed to 15% bonus hp while buffing the flat health gained by a little bit. Other than that tank items are getting their price increased and the armor values are getting nerfed so maybe you can get a jungler that benefit from building devourer.

In terms of current Meta, Nocturne is the choice since Devourer/Damage junglers are the thing right now.

Maokai isn't a bad buy though since you can play him top too with no problems.

AP Fizz Jungle is pretty strong right now too
if you don't own j4 or lee, get one of them. if you do, I'd get sej or noc tbh. maokai is better as a top atm, skarner is getting reworked again so you might not like him after that
